contribution_desc:
The poster describes an idea of how urban objects (IoT devices placed in a neighbourhood) can support spontaneous social interactions and discovery of the neighbourhood.
Not much details are given in the written paper. 

Might even be moved to outside of scope or trash.
use_cases_desc: "Not only immigrants from different countries need to explore new environments, but also students starting to study at a university, employees who take a job in a different town, as well as older adults moving to a home with disability access."
